settings.title: Service & Help
settings.header-body: Many faults, error patterns or anomalies can be quickly and easily remedied by yourself. In most cases, you can then use your coffee machine again directly and do not have to send it to our repair centre. Here you will find tips on the quickest and best solution.

settings.question: How to descale my machine?
settings.answer:
• 1. Turn on machine
  • 2. Fill water tank with descaling solution and water all the way to the max line
  • 3. Put your water tank back into your machine and start the descale (power & espresso button together)
  • 3. Place a 32oz pitcher under the spout and click the blinking espresso button 
    Water should start to run in intervals
  • 4. Once the machine has filled the 32oz, remove tank and pitcher (do not wait for refill water sign)
  • 5. Empty the pitcher and place it back under spout
    Empty tank out, rinse and fill with clean water, place back into machine
  • 6. The machine should automatically start rinsing 
  • 7. It will rinse out 24oz in two intervals
  • 8. It will rinse 12oz, stop for 60 seconds, and rinse the remaining 12oz 
  • 9. When finished it will enter rest mode
  • 10. Turn machine back on and it should be ready to brew!

settings.question: My machine is stuck in descale mode; no water is coming out.
settings.answer: Power off for 4 hours then turn on again and the machine will start disposing water again starts rinse cycle and finishes descale cycle.

settings.question: How to do a Factory Reset
settings.answer:
Power on machine and wait for control panel lights to come on
Hold down the power button and boost button together for approx. 5 seconds or until you hear your machine beep twice
Power it off and wait 60 seconds
Power machine back on and it should be ready to brew- run a cup of coffee

settings.question: How to place brewing unit into machine
settings.answer:
Turn on your machine
Remove the brewing unit door 
Press the sensor on the top left corner of door opening with a key or paperclip at the same time you will click the black button in the middle of the white gear on your machine, (where the brewing unit attaches)
Hold both together until the gear turns into its correct position
Place brewing unit back into machine 
Close brewing unit door and machine should be ready to brew

settings.question: My brewing unit is stuck in 45 angle
